name: Aaron Punzalan
summary: Motivated aspiring web developer eager to grow skills and contribute to innovative, user-focused web projects in a collaborative setting. Seeking hands-on experience with modern web technologies.
skills: Always Eager to Learn and Improve

experience.description: Developed and refined the front end of an Inventory System, and Performance Management System using Angular, improving user experience and interface usability.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology Major in Web Development

projects.name: Pinescape
projects.description: Developed a front-end travel website focused on Baguio City, allowing users to explore destinations and book their travel, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: Sole Vibe
projects.description: Developed a front end web application for sneaker enthusiasts to browse and order sneakers, built with React and Tailwind CSS.

projects.name: HallyuVerse
projects.description: Developed a front end Angular and Tailwind CSS website for K-Drama fans to browse genres, view drama details, watch trailers, and add it to their favorites.

projects.name: ScentHub
projects.description: Developed a full-stack website for perfume enthusiasts to write, view, and like reviews using React, Node.js, and Express.js.

projects.name: Objectiva - Capstone Project
projects.description: Developed the front end of an interactive website that teaches OOP principles in Java through lessons, exercises, and quizzes using Angular.

projects.name: Inventory System & Performance Management System - OJT Project
projects.description: Built the front end of both an Inventory System and a Performance Management System using Angular, enabling efficient supply tracking, report generation, performance reviews, and employee tracking features.
